pages.text: This ritual will allow the player to transform their useless inactive division sigil into something more useful. $(br2)To see the requirements for the ritual, you can either shift right click and enchantment table, or read them on the next page.

$(l)Requirements: $() $(br) $(li) The enchantment table needs a redstone circle around it. $(li) There needs to be natural earth under the enchantment table and redstone circle. $(li) The altar needs to be in darkness (aside from the light given off by the enchantment table).

$(l)Requirements (cont.) $() $(br) $(li) The altar needs to see the sky. $(li) The ritual needs to be performed sometime around midnight. $(br2)Once all of these requirements are met, a sacrifice will be needed to complete the ritual.
